#Read the csv file with data from 2017 onwards and filter for only those from year = 2023
```{r}
library(dplyr)
data1 <- read.csv("2017-2024_resale_prices.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

resale_price_2023 <- data1 |> 
  mutate(year = substr(month,1,4)) |> 
  filter(year == 2023)
```

#Data Cleaning
```{r}
#look at summary statistics 
summary(resale_price_2023)

#check for null values
na_counts <- colSums(is.na(resale_price_2023))
na_counts
```
